text: Petropavlovka (, Buryat and , Shivee) is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Dzhidinsky District of the Republic of Buryatia, Russia. Population: ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * Category:Rural localities in Dzhidinsky District
title: Petropavlovka, Dzhidinsky District, Republic of Buryatia
